channel.title: How do i get a wireless connection so i can portforward
channel.description:
if i need to have a wireless connection to portforward then how do i get a free wireless connection cause every vid and posts i see they all had wireless connection.
how do i get a free connection
thanks for ur help

item.title: How do i get a wireless connection so i can portforward
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

uh… not the way i see it…lolmy freind took his comp off the wireless connection hooked the net to his compfrom his modem, i got on his no-ip, and recently with the SYI dude… id rather hamachi over no-ip… cuz… he cant get in XD even if he does 1 ip ban and hes gone for good

item.title: How do i get a wireless connection so i can portforward
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

hippie:

if… u dont have a wireless connection… YOU DONT HAVE TO PORT FORWARD!!!

Actualy if you don’t have a wireless connection you Can’t portforward. Which means he will be stuck with Hamachi.

item.title: How do i get a wireless connection so i can portforward
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

You can’t get a “free” wireless connection. Your internet connection has to be something other then Dial-Up. Then you will have to go out and buy a wireless router. So it’s not cheap, and not easy.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i get a wireless connection so i can portforward
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

if u dont have a wireless connection u done need to port forward…lolz

if u dont have a router u dont need to port forward… i mean cmon everyvid that port forwards… has a wireless connection… duh if u dont have 1 u dont need to… have a nice day sorry if i sound like im flaming
